Tolkien-related events that took place in 2008.

content.title: January
content.content:
1 - Fantasy novel The Search for the Red Dragon, featuring J.R.R. Tolkien as a fictional character, is published.
3 - Birthday Toast.
3 - The Tolkien Society's Birthday Dinner.
5 - The Times ranks J.R.R. Tolkien the sixth-best post-war British writer.
14 - The Lord of the Rings: The Ultimate Critical Review is released.
? - Amon Hen 209 is published.

content.title: February
content.content:
6 - Artist John Alvin dies.
7-9 - C.S. Lewis, the Inklings, and the Call to Christian Community conference, featuring Tom Shippey.
11 - The Tolkien Estate, The Tolkien Trust and HarperCollins file a lawsuit against New Line Cinema and the Saul Zaentz Company.
13 - The twelfth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The Ashen Wastes", is released in North America.
14 - The twelfth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The Ashen Wastes", is released in Europe.
15 - The Lord of the Rings and the Western Narrative Tradition is published

content.title: March
content.content:
4 - Composer Leonard Rosenman dies.
9 - Tolkien's Shorter Works is published.
10 - The Lord of the Rings is elected as the "Best Foreign Book of All Time" in the Netherlands.
11 - Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings – Sources of Inspiration is published.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
31 - Tolkien's Gedling is published.
? - Amon Hen 210 is published.
? - Mallorn 45 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
24 - Guillermo del Toro is announced as the director of The Hobbit film adaptation and it's proposed sequel.
24 - The thirteenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Doom of the Last-King", is released in North America.
28 - Tolkien - min vän Ronald och hans världar is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
1 - Of Words and Worlds is published.
1 - The thirteenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Doom of the Last-King", is released in Europe.
10 - Frank Frazetta, who created illustrations for The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings dies.
23 - The RiffTrax commentary of The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is released online.
? - Amon Hen 211 is published.
? - Lembas Extra: Proceedings of the 5th Unquendor Lustrum is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
5-8 - Forodrim's 36th birthday celebration.
10 - Actor David Brierly dies.

content.title: July
content.content:
1 - Tolkien On Fairy-stories is published.
10-13 - Tolkien Thing X.
22 - The fourteenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The Ring-forges of Eregion", is released in North America.
24 - The fourteenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The Ring-forges of Eregion", is released in Europe.
? - Tolkien Studies: Volume 5 is published.
? - Amon Hen 212 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
1 - Pauline Baynes, Tolkien's favourite artist, dies.
15-18 - Mythcon 39.

content.title: September
content.content:
8 - Tolkien's Oxford is published.
25-28 - Oxonmoot 2008.
? - The 2008 edition of Tales from the Perilous Realm is published.
? - Amon Hen 213 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
7 - The radio series of Tales from the Perilous Realm is re-released in the US.
21 - Fantasy novel The Indigo King, featuring J.R.R. Tolkien as a fictional character, is published.
23 - The Spoken Word: British Writers, featuring an interview with J.R.R. Tolkien, is released.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - The Tolkien Name in History is published.
12 - Fantasy, Myth and the Measure of Truth: Tales of Pullman, Lewis, Tolkien, MacDonald and Hoffmann is published.
18 - The fifteenth and final book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Daughter of Strife", is released.
18 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria is released.
20 - Tolkien, Race and Cultural History: From Fairies to Hobbits is published.
? - Amon Hen 214 is published.
